bio:
Note: Please use the Help Center for help requests - vimeo.com/help

self-proclaimed gentleman/explorer. i make videos and then put them on the Vimeo. my avatar is exactly how I look everyday just in case you were wondering.

my best videos are on my channel if you care to view them - vimeo.com/channels/badmalone

I help direct this wonderful community. It's my job to keep things fun, sweetacular, and inspirational. so if that's not what's going on, let me know.

Questions? Comments? Hypotheticals? Email me -- Blake at Vimeo dot com
or IM me @ VimeoHelp


I use these, they are great. Ask me about them:
Canon SD 750
Panasonic HVX-200
canon HF 10

Editing: Final Cut Pro

Flickr: http://www.flickr.com/photos/blakewhitman/
Tumblr: http://blakewhitman.tumblr.com/
Twitter: http://twitter.com/blakewhitman
